code: import"./Toggle.css";import Day from"../../img/sun.png";import Night from"../../img/moon.png";import{useContext}from"react";import{ThemeContext}from"../../Context";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Toggle=function Toggle(){var theme=useContext(ThemeContext);var handleClick=function handleClick(){theme.dispatch({type:"TOGGLE"});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"t",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:Day,alt:"",className:"t-icon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:Night,alt:"",className:"t-icon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"t-button",onClick:handleClick,style:{left:theme.state.darkMode?0:25}})]});};export default Toggle;
